name: Oil-Dri - Digital Data Layer Platform for Data-Driven Decision Making
description: Digital data layer platform development for a leading manufacturer and supplier of specialty sorbent products serving both consumer and B2B markets. The platform enhances data-driven decision making capabilities, enabling proactive forecasting and strategic response to future challenges and opportunities with greater operational agility.
challenge: Data inconsistencies and extraction difficulties from various systems leading to inefficiencies. High reliance on manual intervention across departments hindering process automation and consistency. Reports lacked user-friendliness making interpretation difficult. Data existed in silos leading to fragmented insights and limiting comprehensive analysis. Heavy reliance on Excel for task management and inability to meet ongoing requests in timely manner causing operational delays. High retention risk and growing demand for predictive tools to anticipate emerging needs and challenges.
solution: Built comprehensive digital data layer platform to reduce fragmentation by consolidating multiple data repositories, internal and external applications, and data sets into a Single Source of Truth (SSOT). Increased data reliance through timely availability of accurate and actionable data for monitoring progress and KPIs. Streamlined processes and tools to reduce user burden for data quality validation while establishing trust through BI reports. Implemented one-stop-shop solution for all internal users with smart and dynamic visualizations providing comprehensive analysis across relevant data products.
outcomes: Consolidated multiple data repositories into Single Source of Truth (SSOT)
Increased reliance on timely, accurate and actionable data for KPI monitoring
Streamlined processes reducing burden on users for data quality validation
Established greater trust through comprehensive BI Reports
Faster processing of Loss/Run files at optimum operational cost
One-stop-shop solution for all internal users
Enhanced insights through smart and dynamic visualizations
Comprehensive analysis across relevant data products
Improved operational agility and strategic growth capabilities
Better predictive capabilities for anticipating future challenges
teamSize: Data engineering and analytics team including data architects, ETL developers, and business intelligence specialists
